Introduction¶

Orange Textable is an open-source add-on bringing advanced text-analytical functionalities to the Orange Canvas data mining software package (itself open-source). It essentially enables users to build data tables on the basis of text data, by means of a flexible and intuitive interface.

Orange Textable was designed and implemented by LangTech Sàrl on behalf of the department of language and information sciences (SLI) at the University of Lausanne (see Credits and How to cite Orange Textable).
